text: DYAJ (90.3 FM), broadcasting as Power 90.3, is a radio station owned and operated by Word Broadcasting Corporation. Its studio and transmitter are located in Ormoc.In Ormoc, radio station’s legality questionedDSWD SCORES NEW PARTNERS – PASAR FOUNDATION INC., DYAJ POWER FM, AND BASEY SAMAR CHAPTER OF PYAPUngab mihimakak nga protectorDSWD: Private-Public Partnership in Kalahi- CIDSS ==References== Category:Radio stations in Leyte (province) Category:Radio stations established in 2005 Category:Christian radio stations in the Philippines
title: DYAJ-FM
